correct to match [wiki api](http://gazebosim.org/wiki/DRC/UserGuide)

merged multisense_sl_urdf and rosify_plugins back in here.

content.raw:
Is it possible to get rid of the these error messages:

    Error [gazebo_ros_camera_utils.cpp:126] left_camera_optical_frame

    Error [SandiaHandPlugin.cpp:56] Loading SandiaHandPlugin

    Error [SandiaHandPlugin.cpp:195] Deferred Loading SandiaHandPlugin

    Error [AtlasPlugin.cpp:239] Deferred Loading AtlasPlugin
content.html:

pullrequest.title: use sandia-hand package and generate atlas robot from xacro at build time

content.raw:
This should fix it.
~~~
diff -r 530f3006fb9f ros/atlas_description/urdf/atlas_simple_shapes.urdf
--- a/ros/atlas_description/urdf/atlas_simple_shapes.urdf	Wed Jan 16 12:23:30 2013 -0800
+++ b/ros/atlas_description/urdf/atlas_simple_shapes.urdf	Wed Jan 16 17:26:05 2013 -0800
@@ -1,68 +1,4 @@
 <robot name="drc_skeleton">
-    <link name="head">
-      <inertial>
-        <origin xyz="-0.075493 3.3383E-05 0.02774" rpy="0 0 0" />
-        <mass value="1.4199" />
-        <inertia iyy="0.0041178" ixy="-1.5797E-06" iyz="-6.8415E-07" ixx="0.0039688" ixz="-0.00089293" izz="0.0035243" />
-      </inertial>
-      <visual>
-        <origin xyz="-0.0446 0 0.0880" rpy="0 0 1.570795" />
-        <geometry>
-          <mesh filename="package://multisense_sl/meshes/base_link.STL" />
-        </geometry>
-        <material name="">
-          <color rgba="0.9098 0.44314 0.031373 1" />
-        </material>
-      </visual>
-    <collision>
-      <origin xyz="-0.0503 0 -0.00195" rpy="0 0 0" />
-      <geometry>
-        <box size="0.1311 0.12 0.0591"/>
-      </geometry>
-    </collision>
-    <collision>
-      <origin xyz="-0.093 0 0.0868" rpy="0 0 0" />
-      <geometry>
-        <box size="0.0468 0.12 0.1184"/>
-      </geometry>
-    </collision>
-    </link>
-    <link name="hokuyo_link">
-      <inertial>
-        <origin xyz="0.012428 0.0004084 -0.0041835" rpy="0 0 0" />
-        <mass value="0.057664" />
-        <inertia iyy="4.2412E-05" ixy="4.9927E-08" iyz="-9.8165E-09" ixx="3.7174E-05" ixz="1.1015E-05" izz="4.167E-05" />
-      </inertial>
-      <visual>
-        <origin xyz="0 0 0" rpy="1.5707963267949 0 1.5707963267949" />
-        <geometry>
-          <mesh filename="package://multisense_sl/meshes/hokuyo_link.STL" />
-        </geometry>
-        <material name="">
-          <color rgba="0.72941 0.35686 0.023529 1" />
-        </material>
-      </visual>
-    <collision>
-      <origin xyz="0.01885 0 -0.02119" rpy="0 0 0" />
-      <geometry>
-        <box size="0.08 0.06 0.04238"/>
-      </geometry>
-    </collision>
-    <collision>
-      <origin xyz="0.03 0 0.0235" rpy="0 0 0" />
-      <geometry>
-        <cylinder radius="0.024425" length="0.047"/>
-      </geometry>
-    </collision>
-    </link>
-    <joint name="hokuyo_joint" type="continuous">
-      <origin xyz="-0.0446 0 0.0880" rpy="0 0 0" />
-      <parent link="head" />
-      <child link="hokuyo_link" />
-      <axis xyz="1 0 0" />
-      <dynamics damping="0.01" friction="0"/>
-    </joint>
-
     <link name="l_clav">
         <inertial>
             <mass value="2.369" />
~~~
content.html:
This should fix it.

diff -r 530f3006fb9f ros/atlas_description/urdf/atlas_simple_shapes.urdf
--- a/ros/atlas_description/urdf/atlas_simple_shapes.urdf   Wed Jan 16 12:23:30 2013 -0800
+++ b/ros/atlas_description/urdf/atlas_simple_shapes.urdf   Wed Jan 16 17:26:05 2013 -0800
@@ -1,68 +1,4 @@
 <robot name="drc_skeleton">
-    <link name="head">
-      <inertial>
-        <origin xyz="-0.075493 3.3383E-05 0.02774" rpy="0 0 0" />
-        <mass value="1.4199" />
-        <inertia iyy="0.0041178" ixy="-1.5797E-06" iyz="-6.8415E-07" ixx="0.0039688" ixz="-0.00089293" izz="0.0035243" />
-      </inertial>
-      <visual>
-        <origin xyz="-0.0446 0 0.0880" rpy="0 0 1.570795" />
-        <geometry>
-          <mesh filename="package://multisense_sl/meshes/base_link.STL" />
-        </geometry>
-        <material name="">
-          <color rgba="0.9098 0.44314 0.031373 1" />
-        </material>
-      </visual>
-    <collision>
-      <origin xyz="-0.0503 0 -0.00195" rpy="0 0 0" />
-      <geometry>
-        <box size="0.1311 0.12 0.0591"/>
-      </geometry>
-    </collision>
-    <collision>
-      <origin xyz="-0.093 0 0.0868" rpy="0 0 0" />
-      <geometry>
-        <box size="0.0468 0.12 0.1184"/>
-      </geometry>
-    </collision>
-    </link>
-    <link name="hokuyo_link">
-      <inertial>
-        <origin xyz="0.012428 0.0004084 -0.0041835" rpy="0 0 0" />
-        <mass value="0.057664" />
-        <inertia iyy="4.2412E-05" ixy="4.9927E-08" iyz="-9.8165E-09" ixx="3.7174E-05" ixz="1.1015E-05" izz="4.167E-05" />
-      </inertial>
-      <visual>
-        <origin xyz="0 0 0" rpy="1.5707963267949 0 1.5707963267949" />
-        <geometry>
-          <mesh filename="package://multisense_sl/meshes/hokuyo_link.STL" />
-        </geometry>
-        <material name="">
-          <color rgba="0.72941 0.35686 0.023529 1" />
-        </material>
-      </visual>
-    <collision>
-      <origin xyz="0.01885 0 -0.02119" rpy="0 0 0" />
-      <geometry>
-        <box size="0.08 0.06 0.04238"/>
-      </geometry>
-    </collision>
-    <collision>
-      <origin xyz="0.03 0 0.0235" rpy="0 0 0" />
-      <geometry>
-        <cylinder radius="0.024425" length="0.047"/>
-      </geometry>
-    </collision>
-    </link>
-    <joint name="hokuyo_joint" type="continuous">
-      <origin xyz="-0.0446 0 0.0880" rpy="0 0 0" />
-      <parent link="head" />
-      <child link="hokuyo_link" />
-      <axis xyz="1 0 0" />
-      <dynamics damping="0.01" friction="0"/>
-    </joint>
-
     <link name="l_clav">
         <inertial>
             <mass value="2.369" />

pull_request.title: use sandia-hand package and generate atlas robot from xacro at build time

pullrequest.title: use sandia-hand package and generate atlas robot from xacro at build time

content.raw: Now we have another synchronization problem between `ros/atlas_description/urdf/atlas.urdf` and `ros/atlas_description/urdf/atlas_simple_shapes.urdf`. The xacro currently uses atlas_simple_shapes.urdf, but changesets eaf9ee5 and d5aaf22 make changes to atlas.urdf but not atlas_simple_shapes.urdf.
content.html: Now we have another synchronization problem between ros/atlas_description/urdf/atlas.urdf and ros/atlas_description/urdf/atlas_simple_shapes.urdf. The xacro currently uses atlas_simple_shapes.urdf, but changesets eaf9ee5 and d5aaf22 make changes to atlas.urdf but not atlas_simple_shapes.urdf.

content.raw: I just tried testing it using the sandia-hand deb, but it's out of date. We'll should release a new version of that deb. For now I'll test with a local build of sandia-hand.
content.html: I just tried testing it using the sandia-hand deb, but it's out of date. We'll should release a new version of that deb. For now I'll test with a local build of sandia-hand.
